，业务覆盖欧洲、亚洲及多个新兴体育市场，: , with business operations spanning Europe, Asia, and multiple emerging sports markets.
是专注于体育产业与数字经济深度融合的国际化综合服务平台。: The Group is an international integrated service platform dedicated to the deep integration of the sports industry and the digital economy.
Focusing on core areas including sports investment, event operations, digital sports, sports media and entertainment, and asset management, MAITU Sports has established a diversified and synergistic industry ecosystem, continuously enhancing its resource integration capabilities and operational standards.
Leveraging advanced technologies such as big data, artificial intelligence, and blockchain, MAITU Sports provides professional clubs, event IPs, and sports institutions with systematic management solutions, value assessment services, and global support, further strengthening its service capacity and platform competitiveness.
以数字技术推动体育产业升级: To drive the upgrading of the sports industry through digital technologies
以专业管理提升资源配置效率: to enhance resource allocation efficiency through professional management
以长期价值管理促进产业稳健发展: to promote sustainable industry development through long-term value management
为全球合作伙伴创造可持续发展基础: and to create a solid foundation for sustainable growth for global partners
成为全球领先的体育产业与数字服务融合平台: To become a globally leading integrated platform combining the sports industry and digital services
构建覆盖全球的体育资源管理与服务网络: to build a worldwide network for sports resource management and service delivery
推动体育产业标准化、数字化与国际化发展: to promote the standardization, digitalization, and internationalization of the sports industry
引领体育产业进入高质量发展新时代: and to lead the industry into a new era of high-quality development
以体育产业为核心，整合全球赛事资源、数字技术能力与产业协同网络，构建覆盖投资管理: Centered on the sports industry, MAITU Sports integrates global event resources, digital technology capabilities, and industry collaboration networks to build an integrated system covering investment management, event operations, digital upgrading, and comprehensive industry services.
布局职业俱乐部、赛事IP、联盟权益及青训体系，构建多元化体育资源组合，推动产业长: Strategically investing in professional clubs, event IPs, league rights, and youth development systems to build a diversified sports resource portfolio and promote long-term industry growth.
打造标准化、可复制的赛事体系，提升品牌合作、媒体传播与票务服务能力，实现赛事价值: Developing standardized and replicable event management systems to enhance brand partnerships, media exposure, and ticketing services, ensuring sustainable value generation for event properties.
依托人工智能与大数据技术，实现竞技管理、训练优化与运营决策智能化升级。: Leveraging artificial intelligence and big data technologies to enable intelligent upgrades in athletic management, training optimization, and operational decision-making.
构建内容制作、IP孵化与全球传播体系，扩大体育品牌影响力与用户覆盖面。: Building integrated systems for content production, IP incubation, and global distribution to expand brand influence and audience reach.
围绕数字登记、价值评估与结构优化，推动体育资源规范化管理与有序流通。: Focusing on digital registration, value assessment, and structural optimization to promote standardized management and orderly circulation of sports resources.
提供跨境合规咨询、运营架构设计与风险管理支持，保障业务稳健发展。: Providing cross-border compliance consulting, operational framework design, and risk management support to ensure stable and sustainable business development.
实现体育资源权属登记与流转管理透明化、可追溯化。: Enabling transparent and traceable registration and transfer management of sports resource ownership.
深度挖掘竞技表现与运营数据价值，支撑科学决策。: Deeply analyzing athletic performance and operational data to support scientific and data-driven decision-making.
将赛事、球员与内容资源进行标准化数字建模管理。: Standardizing and digitally modeling events, athletes, and content resources for systematic management.
构建多区域协同运营体系，支持国际化业务发展。: Establishing a multi-regional collaborative operating system to support international business development.
统一赛事、运营、财务与用户数据管理平台。: Unifying event, operational, financial, and user data into a centralized management platform.
建立多层级信息安全与风险管理体系，保障平台稳定运行: Building multi-layered information security and risk management systems to ensure platform stability and operational reliability.
平台 × 数据 × 资源 三位一体驱动体系: Platform × Data × Resources: An Integrated Driving System
迈图体育构建“平台 + 数据 + 资源”协同发展的运营模式，通过项目孵化、资源整: MAITU Sports has established a collaborative operational model based on the integration of platform, data, and resources.
